content: snowflakes are worked in the round from the center outward two yarns are held together throughout each snowflake one strand of everyday dk and one strand of premier glitter thread treat the two yarns as one strand clear fishing line is used to attach snowflakes to garland chain **finished measurements ** each snowflake measures approximately 4 across **gauge ** 16 single_crochet x 17 rnds = 4 with c1 and xc held together save time check your gauge **needles & notions ** us size g-6 4mm or size needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle aleene s fabric stiffener and draping liquid rust-proof pins flat pieces of cardboard for blocking parchment paper optional ziploc bag fishing line or clear thread materials **pr**emier® yarns anti-pilling® everyday® dk 100% anti-pilling acrylic 3 5 oz/100g 273yds/250m cc1 1107- 35 sky 1 ball cc2 1107-65 lake 1 ball cc3 1107- 38 porcelain blue 1 ball cc4 1107-52 seaglass 1 ball cc5 1107-02 cream 1 ball premier® yarns glitter thread 100% metalized polyester 35 oz/10g 1093yds/1000m xc 2087-18 ice blue 1 spool
